verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I surrender all,
To the promises You've made
And I will give it all,
To the Maker of the day

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
No one knows your hurt
And No one knows your fears
When no one solves the mystery
Or even whipes away the tears

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Can you hear the sound of laughter
From the other side of life
Their are days when I feel like a stranger sometimes
Tell me are there any other souls like me

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
He doesn't love us 'cause of who we are
He only loves us 'cause of who He is (2x)
